text: The UEFA European Under-18 Championship 1964 Final Tournament was held in the Netherlands. ==Teams== The following teams entered the tournament: * * * * * * * * * * * * * (host) * * * * * * * * * * * ==Group stage== ===Group 1=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 6 1 +5 4 2 1 0 1 2 5 –3 2 2 0 0 2 2 4 –2 0 26 March 4–0 28 March 1–2 30 March 2–1 ===Group 2=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 10 0 +10 4 2 1 0 1 3 2 +1 2 2 0 0 2 0 11 –11 0 26 March 8–0 28 March 3–0 30 March 2–0 ===Group 3=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 4 2 +2 4 2 1 0 1 3 2 +1 2 2 0 0 2 1 4 –3 0 26 March 2–1 28 March 2–0 30 March 2–1 ===Group 4=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 4 2 +2 4 2 1 0 1 4 3 +1 2 2 0 0 2 0 3 –3 0 26 March 1–0 28 March 2–0 30 March 3–2 ===Group 5=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 0 1 3 2 +1 2 2 1 0 1 3 3 0 2 2 1 0 1 3 4 –1 2 26 March 2–1 28 March 2–0 30 March 3–1 ===Group 6=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 5 1 +4 4 2 0 0 2 1 5 –4 0 Refused visa by Dutch government. 26 March 3–1 30 March 0–2 ===Group 7=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 1 0 4 2 +2 3 2 1 0 1 2 3 –1 2 2 0 1 1 1 2 –1 1 26 March 1–1 28 March 1–0 30 March 3–1 ===Group 8=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 1 0 7 1 +6 3 2 1 1 0 2 1 +1 3 2 0 0 2 0 7 –7 0 26 March 1–1 28 March 1–0 30 March 6–0 ==Quarterfinals== ==Semifinals== ==Third place match== ==Final== ==Other websites== *Results by RSSSF Category:UEFA European Under-19 Championship Category:1964 in Europe Category:1964 in association football
title: 1964 UEFA European Under-18 Championship
